title: M4: Pre-editing guidelines on referential elements adapted to a particular source language (1)
authorComments: * DIFFICULTY: advanced. * SUPERVISION: teacher-guided. * ESTIMATED ANSWERING TIME: 30 minutes. * LANGUAGE-SPECIFIC CONTENT: none. * ADAPTATION TO OTHER LANGUAGES: not necessary. * COMMENTS FOR INSTRUCTORS: Examples should be provided together with a raw MT out of both the pre-edited and the original source sentence.
